meanings.definition: The act or art of carving designs or figures from wood.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather enjoys woodcarving in his workshop.
meanings.sent2: I bought a beautiful woodcarving of a bear at the craft fair.
meanings.sent3: The woodcarving of a squirrel on the tree looked so realistic that I thought it was alive!
meanings.sent4: Her delicate woodcarving of a flower blooming captured the essence of nature.
meanings.sent5: The intricate woodcarving of a dragon on the door was truly mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A carved design or figure made from wood.
meanings.sent1: The woodcarving of an owl on the shelf caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: She gifted me a woodcarving of a heart for Valentine's Day.
meanings.sent3: The woodcarving of a cat on the fence seemed to be watching me.
meanings.sent4: The woodcarving of a ship sailing on the waves symbolized freedom.
meanings.sent5: The woodcarving of a lion's face on the wall was both fierce and majestic.
